diluted 0.74$ 0.61$ 0.72$ 1.99$ 1.99$ Shares used in per share calculation - diluted 253 252 252 253 254 2 2 Three Fiscal Quarters Ended (1) A reconciliation of the non-GAAP measures presented above to the most directly comparable GAAP financial data appears on the next page. These non- GAAP measures are provided in addition to and not as a substitute for measures of financial performance prepared in accordance with GAAP. The financial summary excludes amortization of intangible assets, share-based compensation expense, restructuring charges, acquisition-related costs and income tax effects of non-GAAP reconciling adjustments.
